assertionResults.fullName: graphql should throw an error when name is empty
assertionResults.title: should throw an error when name is empty

assertionResults.fullName: Duration component should render seconds correctly
assertionResults.title: should render seconds correctly

assertionResults.fullName: Duration component should not render only milliseconds
assertionResults.title: should not render only milliseconds

assertionResults.fullName: Duration component should not render a Duration with a undefined duration
assertionResults.title: should not render a Duration with a undefined duration

assertionResults.fullName: Duration component should render multiple duration types, no years correctly
assertionResults.title: should render multiple duration types, no years correctly

assertionResults.fullName: Duration component should render all duration types.
assertionResults.title: should render all duration types.

assertionResults.fullName: ActiveDuration component should render using a startDate and a zero duration
assertionResults.title: should render using a startDate and a zero duration

assertionResults.fullName: ActiveDuration component should render using a startDate and a duration in seconds
assertionResults.title: should render using a startDate and a duration in seconds

assertionResults.fullName: ActiveDuration component should increase the duration by one second each second
assertionResults.title: should increase the duration by one second each second
